source:
TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Tolas would express his gratitude for all that you have done on his behalf.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête
Tolas aimerait vous remercier...

source:
TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_01Tolas is well pleased to see you return, and cheerfully explains that he has resumed his duties with the guard since last you met. He then mentions that he is about to depart for the Crystarium in order to place a supply order with Mauwyl. He invites you along, that you might together clear the roads to the city of threatening beasts, and subsequently reunite with your woodcutter friend.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_01Cette quête est  synchronisée avec votre niveau.

Tolas vous a expliqué que sa vie est rentrée dans l'ordre grâce à vous, et qu'il a pu reprendre ses fonctions normalement. Il doit partir pour une mission de routine et vous a demandé de l'accompagner. Allez lui parler dans la forêt du Berger égaré.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_02<tab>As you make your way through the woods, you come upon Tolas standing over the body of a fallen monster. The guardsman explains that he was attacked by the beast, but was able to make short work of it, showing no signs of the crippling fear and anxiety that had plagued him when you first met. Feeling relieved and happy for your friend, you smile and press on.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_02<tab>Tolas a rencontré des monstres en chemin, mais il a pu les maîtriser. Reparlez-lui lorsque vous serez prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à continuer la route.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_03<tab>Venturing further into the forest, you and Tolas come upon a pack of angry anemones. Tolas suggests that you dispatch them with some stink bombs, a handy tool the guardsman says will drive the beasts away in short order. Intrigued at the idea of dispatching monsters with nonviolent means, you take the unconventional instruments in hand and prepare for a game of toss.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_03<tab>Alors que vous avez rencontré un groupe d'anémones, Tolas vous a expliqué qu'il était possible de les éloigner en utilisant une bombe odorante. Essayez d'en lancer une sur chacune des anémones enragées.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_04<tab>The stink bombs are remarkably effective in driving away the beasts that had blocked your path. Pinching your nose to protect against the stench, you begin walking back to report to Tolas, that you might continue on your journey.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_04<tab>La stratégie des bombes a fonctionné, et vous avez réussi à éloigner les anémones sans prendre de risque. Allez maintenant reparler à Tolas pour faire le point.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_05<tab>Tolas congratulates you with a smile, and further informs that the handy stink bombs were fashioned by none other than Mauwyl himself to protect him on his forays into the forest. Nodding your head in admiration of the young woodcutter's ingenuity, you stride off in the direction of the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_05<tab>Tolas vous a expliqué que la bombe que vous avez utilisée est une invention des bûcherons locaux, fabriquée à partir d'une herbe. Continuez la mission en parlant à Tolas dans la forêt du Berger égaré.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_06<tab>As you progress further on, Tolas stops to comment on the inordinate number of monsters lurking in the woods on this day. You have barely opened your mouth to speak when you are cut off by a man's scream, apparently coming from a short distance away. You and your guardsman companion quickly rush to the man's aid.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_06<tab>Tolas a entendu un cri et s'est précipité dans sa direction. Suivez-le pour savoir de quoi il retourne.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_07<tab>At the scene of the scream, you find Tolas together with a familiar face: the guardsman Nielden, who had been beset by a fiend while gathering supplies. Though the men were able to dispatch the monster, Tolas suffered a light wound in the battle. Nielden insists that the two of you go with him to Fort Jobb, where your mutual friend Callea, might tend to the guardsman's wound.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_07<tab>Tolas s'est blessé en voulant protéger un soldat du nom de Nielden. Ce dernier a insisté pour que son courageux sauveteur se fasse ausculter par le médecin de Fort Jobb. Suivez-les sur place et interrogez Tolas.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_08<tab>Callea is overjoyed to see you again, and cheerfully volunteers to dress Tolas's wound. The guardsman is most impressed by the efficacy of the girl's hand-fashioned salves, and asks if he might purchase a batch to bring back to the Imperative. Callea is flattered, but explains that unfortunately she barely has enough ingredients to make potions for Fort Jobb. At your suggestion, Tolas proposes a plan: that you task the woodcutter Mauwyl with procuring the necessary herbs. Though she is reluctant to impose on the kindness of strangers, Callea agrees to accompany you to the Crystarium to make the request in person.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_08<tab>Ayant rencontré Callea et eu vent de ses problèmes pour se fournir en ingrédients nécessaires à ses remèdes, Tolas a eu l'idée de lui présenter Mauwyl. Allez à Musica Universalis et parlez à Tolas pour concrétiser l'idée.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_09<tab>Arriving at the Crystarium with your companions, you enjoy a joyous reunion with Mauwyl. Hearing the proposal from Tolas, the youth cheerfully agrees, and all present rejoice at what is sure to be a beneficial arrangement for all the involved parties. Tolas offers an observation about your remarkable ability to bring people together. Bowing deeply, he offers his profuse thanks for all you have done─not only for him and his friends, but for the greater good of Lakeland.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SEQ_09<tab>Grâce à l'idée de Tolas, Mauwyl va aider Callea à augmenter sa production de remèdes et même en fournir à L'Impératif d'Ostall. Les problèmes d'approvisionnement en médicaments seront peut-être ainsi bientôt réglés...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Tolas.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Tolas au nord de Rouillechaînes

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Tolas again.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_01<tab>Parler de nouveau à Tolas

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_02<tab>Use stink bombs to repel the angry anemones.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_02<tab>Utiliser les <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8F450302 /var> sur les anémones enragées

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Tolas.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Tolas yet again.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_04<tab>Parler de nouveau à Tolas

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_05<tab>Follow Tolas.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_05<tab>Suivre Tolas

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Nielden at Fort Jobb.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_06<tab>Parler à Nielden à Fort Jobb

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Tolas at Musica Universalis.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TODO_07<tab>Parler à Tolas à Musica Universalis

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thanks in no small part to you, I have been able to fully resume my duties with the guard. As a matter of fact, I was just about to depart for the Crystarium to secure a shipment of building materials.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Grâce à vous, j'ai pu reprendre le travail. Je dois justement partir en mission à Cristarium.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_001<tab>I trust that you, too, will be returning to the city? If so, then pray give me the pleasure of your company on the road.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_001<tab>Si jamais vous y allez aussi, vous aimeriez faire route avec moi<var 1D /var>? J'ai envie de vous montrer à quel point je suis redevenu un soldat digne de ce nom.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_002<tab>Thank you so very much, my friend. The roads are dangerous these days, and I would feel all the better with a capable combatant at my side. Together, I daresay we could do our fair share to clear the path of threats for the travelers who will come after us.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_002<tab>Merci. Ma mission aujourd'hui est de m'assurer de la sûreté de la route et de vérifier l'état du transport du ra<var 16 /var>vi<var 16 /var>tail<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment. Je dois donc éliminer les monstres sur la route de Cristarium.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_003<tab>You may be pleased to know that the supplier I mean to meet with is none other than our mutual friend Mauwyl. No doubt he will be delighted to see you again as well.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_003<tab>Et la personne à qui je dois donner les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions récoltées n'est autre que Mauwyl. Il est en train de préparer le prochain ra<var 16 /var>vi<var 16 /var>tail<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment, à l'heure actuelle. Il sera sûrement content de vous voir.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_004<tab>At any rate, see to whatever preparations you may have. I am ready to depart whenever you are.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_004<tab>Bon, il n'y a plus qu'à se mettre en route.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_010<tab>One can barely take a few paces without running into one of these fiends, no? As you can see, I had no trouble seeing to the threat.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_010<tab>Ça n'a pas traîné<var 1D /var>! Mais comme vous le voyez, je n'ai aucune difficulté à éliminer des monstres.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_011<tab><var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is what you have done for me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I am able to summon all of my strength and skill once more, and I fear for any beast that dares stand in my path.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_011<tab>Grâce à vous, tout est rentré dans l'ordre. Je ne me laisserai plus impressionner par ce genre d'ennemis. Bien, continuons.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>The angry anemone eyes you warily...
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>L'anémone enragée vous observe fixement...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_020<tab>Do you see those floating nasties over there? They have grown plentiful in these parts of late.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_020<tab>Hum, ces monstres sont assez proches les uns des autres... Cette mission est prévue pour un binôme, normalement. À deux, ça ne poserait aucun problème.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_100_020<tab>While we could cut them down easily enough, their endless screams and tittering are like as not to attract more of their friends.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_100_020<tab>Hélas, nous avons moins de gens disponibles depuis les attaques des purgateurs, alors nous y allons seuls.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_021<tab>Fortunately, we've recently discovered a method for dealing with these creatures quickly and effortlessly. Behold the ever-handy stink bomb. When thrown, they emit a stench that─while barely tolerable for us─is positively sickening to creatures with sensitive noses.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_021<tab>Mais il y a une stratégie. On leur lance ces <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8F450302 /var>, qui sont imprégné<var 08 ((<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8F4507 /var>)) ((e)) (()) /var>s d'une odeur qu'ils détestent, et ils s'éloignent tout de suite de la route.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_022<tab>This will drive the beasts away, as well as deterring any of their friends from joining the party. Here's a handful of them: why not give them a try?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_022<tab>C'est plutôt agréable d'arriver à se débarrasser des monstres sans dégainer son épée. Est-ce que vous voulez essayer<var 1D /var>? Il suffit d'utiliser <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8F450202 /var> sur chaque anémone.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_023<tab>Just toss the stink bombs in the vicinity of the anemones, and watch as our foe scatters and skitters away to escape the stench.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_023<tab>Est-ce que vous voulez essayer d'éloigner les monstres<var 1D /var>? Il suffit d'utiliser <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8F450202 /var> sur chaque anémone.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>The angry anemone eyes you warily. Toss a stink bomb in its direction to chase it away.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>L'anémone enragée vous observe fixement... Utilisez <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8F450202 /var> pour l'éloigner.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MONSTERA_100_030<tab>Graaaaaah!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MONSTERA_100_030<tab>... Ughiiii<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_110_030<tab>The angry anemone lets out a pained screech and flees from the scene. A moment later, the stench of raw refuse and night soils wafts in on the air...
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_110_030<tab>L'anémone enragée s'est enfuie à toute vitesse... Seule l'odeur piquante <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0AF61E8F450202 /var> demeure dans l'air.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MONSTERB_120_030<tab>Unnngraaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MONSTERB_120_030<tab>Ughyaaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_130_030<tab>The angry anemone shrieks out and flutters away in a rush...
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_130_030<tab>L'anémone enragée s'est enfuie à toute vitesse...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MONSTERC_140_030<tab>Greeeccchhh!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MONSTERC_140_030<tab>... Ughyeeeh<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_150_030<tab>The anemone cries out and races from the scene. The stench is growing unbearable...
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_SYSTEM_150_030<tab>L'anémone enragée s'est enfuie à toute vitesse... Seule l'odeur piquante <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0AF61E8F450202 /var> demeure dans l'air.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_030<tab>Rather effective, wouldn't you say? Thanks to tools like this, even new recruits and others less comfortable with a blade than you or I can hold their own against all manner of nasty creatures.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_030<tab>Alors, plutôt efficace, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Avec ça, même les soldats qui manquent d'en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment physique peuvent chasser les monstres sans risque. Et vous savez quoi<var 1D /var>? C'est Mauwyl qui nous les a procurées.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_031<tab>In fact, it was none other than Mauwyl who procured these for us. As he tells it, they've long been favored by woodcutters, gatherers, and the like seeking to protect themselves during forays deep into the forest.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_031<tab>L'ingrédient principal est une herbe qui pousse dans les environs. Les bûcherons s'en servent depuis longtemps pour se protéger... une sorte de recette de grand-mère des gens de la forêt.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_032<tab>Speaking of Mauwyl, we shouldn't keep him waiting. Let us be on our way.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_032<tab>Mais pardon, l'heure n'est pas au bavardage. Continuons notre route.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_040<tab>The beasts are out in numbers today. We have been undermanned of late, and this is the price we pay.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_040<tab>Il y a vraiment beaucoup de monstres aujourd'hui. Est-ce parce que nous avons moins de patrouilles<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_041<tab>(-Man's Scream-)Gahhh! Get back, you godsdamned fiend!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_041<tab>(-Homme en colère-)Aaargh<var 1D /var>! Bon sang... saletés de monstres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_042<tab>A cry for help!? Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─we must hurry to the man's aid!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_042<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'était que ces cris<var 1D /var>? Ça venait de l'est<var 1D /var>! Allons-y, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_050<tab><pant> <pant> Well, I'll be damned... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? What are you doin' here?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_050<tab>M-mais que faites-vous ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_051<tab>The beast nicked me in the leg, but worry not─it is but a flesh wound. I am Tolas, and I serve the Crystarium guard at the Ostall Imperative. How do you fare, my brother-in-arms?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_051<tab>Ce n'est rien, juste quelques égra<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>gnu<var 16 /var>res... Mais et vous<var 1D /var>? Vous êtes aussi soldat, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_052<tab>I'm Nielden, servin' at Radisca's Round. As for my wounds, they could've been much worse, an' I thank you for that.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_052<tab>Oui, je suis de l'escadron de la Garde de Radisca. Je n'ai rien, merci.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_100_052<tab>Came to the forest to pick herbs and reagents for a batch o' potions, but it seems I got a bit too wrapped up in the task. 'Fore I knew it, the beast was on top o' me.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_100_052<tab>Je suis ici pour récolter des herbes médicinales, mais comme j'ai eu des difficultés avec ce travail que je connais mal, ma vigilance s'est un peu relâchée et un monstre m'a attaqué par derrière.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_053<tab>Ye have my gratitude, as well as my apologies for that nasty wound you suffered comin' to my aid. Don't you worry, though. We've a talented physician at Fort Jobb who'd be more than happy to patch ye right up!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_053<tab>Je suis désolé que vous soyez blessé par ma faute... Retournons à Fort Jobb. Là-bas, vous pourrez recevoir des soins.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_054<tab>I appreciate the offer, but that will not be necessary. It is but a scratch, and my friend and I have places we must─
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_054<tab>Inutile. Ce n'est qu'une blessure superficielle, je n'ai pas besoin de soins...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_055<tab>There's no way I'm going to send the man who saved my damned life back out there lookin' like that! Er, I mean, I insist. Fort Jobb's just a short walk away, an' our physician truly is one o' the best.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_055<tab>Je ne peux pas vous laisser comme ça, enfin<var 1D /var>! Il y a un médecin à Fort Jobb, je vous emmène la voir, un point c'est tout. Ne faites pas d'histoires<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_056<tab>'Course, I speak of Callea. She's been holdin' down the fort damned well since last we met. People swear she's the second coming of her dear ol' father, bless his name.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_056<tab>Et tu la connais, toi aussi. C'est Callea. Elle a beaucoup plus d'expérience, maintenant, c'est une vraie pro.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_057<tab>Ye'll be comin' along too, won't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? The girl'd be beside herself with joy to see ye again.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_057<tab>Et je suis sûr qu'elle aimerait te revoir. Une raison de plus pour y aller<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_058<tab>Very well. If you, too, are a friend of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I see no reason to refuse. Pray lead the way.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_058<tab>Bon, d'accord. Je ne veux pas inquiéter <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> en plus de tout ça. Allons-y, si vous y tenez tant.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_059<tab>Now that's what I wanted to hear! The fort's just a ways in that direction. Let's be off, eh?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_059<tab>Alors c'est décidé. En route pour Fort Jobb<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_070<tab>The wound is nothing to speak of, but I am not a man who would refuse the kindness of his friends.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_070<tab>Ce n'est vraiment pas grave, mais puisqu'il insiste...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_071<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What a lovely surprise! How ever have you been?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_071<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Quelle bonne surprise, je ne pensais pas vous revoir si tôt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_072<tab>There'll be time enough for small talk after, Callea. Right now, this man needs your help. Got himself right scratched up saving ol' Uncle Nieldy from a nasty critter.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_072<tab>Callea, tu veux bien examiner cet homme<var 1D /var>? Il a été blessé en me protégeant.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_073<tab>Oh, heavens! You must come with me at once, good sir. Uncle Nielden, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you two can wait here. It will not take me long.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_073<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>! Suivez-moi, je vais regarder ça tout de suite. Vous deux, vous pouvez attendre ici.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_074<tab>...And that should do it. Once again, Ser Tolas, you have my sincere gratitude for saving Uncle Nielden's life. But do promise me you'll be more careful in the future, yes?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_074<tab>Merci d'avoir secouru Nielden. Mais attention à ne pas prendre trop de risques<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_075<tab>Hah! I had a mind to impress you with the confidence and composure you helped me regain, but instead it would appear that I have embarrassed myself once again.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_075<tab>Je voulais vous montrer comme j'avais retrouvé mes facultés d'autrefois, mais j'ai un peu raté mon coup. Moi qui étais si fier de moi...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_076<tab>Hm? Do you mean to say that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> came to your aid as well? Why, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> did the same for me!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_076<tab>Mais dites-moi... vous aussi, vous avez été sauvé par <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_077<tab>You don't say! And what, pray tell, did our friend do for you?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_077<tab>C'est exact<var 1D /var>! Quel hasard<var 1D /var>! Racontez-moi donc ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_078<tab>Heh. Just can't help helpin' folks, eh? That's all well and good, mind ye, but promise me ye'll take as good care of yerself as ye do others.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_078<tab>Décidément, vous aimez vraiment voler au secours des gens. C'est une grande qualité, mais il faut savoir être prudent, aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_079<tab>The last thing anyone in this realm wants is for ye to end up like ol' Colphas, got it?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_079<tab>Vous ne rendriez service à personne en vous faisant tuer. Essayez de ne pas finir comme Colphas... je veux dire, comme le père de Callea.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_080<tab>(-Tolas-)Simply remarkable! The pain is all but gone! And you say this salve is of your own creation?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_080<tab>(-Voix de Tolas-)C'est formidable<var 1D /var>! Vous dites que c'est vous qui avez créé cet onguent<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_081<tab>Yes, though I cannot claim full credit. It is based on a recipe left to me by my departed father. I have had occasion to fashion a few batches, and I have endeavored to improve the potency each time.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_081<tab>Oui, en partie grâce à <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Ces derniers temps, j'étudie les notes de mon père pour fabriquer de nouveaux remèdes.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_082<tab>This is a fine medicine, indeed. What we would not give for a healthy stock of it back at the Imperative...
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_082<tab>Je vois... Si c'est aussi efficace, j'aimerais qu'on en ait un stock permanent à L'Impératif d'Ostall.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_083<tab>Ser Tolas just tried out a salve I fashioned. I do not mean to boast, but it's been quite well received among the guardsmen here at Fort Jobb, as well.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_083<tab>Je suis contente que Tolas ait apprécié mon remède. Les soldats de Fort Jobb ont aussi dit que ça marchait très bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_084<tab>I would like nothing more than to be able to prepare enough to ship to every outpost, but I fear the ingredients are not so easily come by. As is, I can scarcely produce enough for Fort Jobb.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_084<tab>J'aimerais pouvoir en produire plus, mais par manque d'ingrédients, j'ai déjà du mal à en fournir assez pour le fort.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_085<tab>In that case, why not speak with one of the supply caravan leaders? Surely they could procure the materials you need from the markets.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_085<tab>Alors est-ce que vous aimeriez que j'en parle à notre unité d'intendance<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_086<tab>I fear it's not so simple. The herbs used in my father's recipes are all native to these parts. Furthermore, they have a habit of growing in the deepest, most perilous parts of the forest.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_086<tab>Vous savez, mon père se servait uniquement d'herbes utilisées dans les remèdes traditionnels. Ce sont toutes des plantes locales qu'on ne trouve pas dans le commerce.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_087<tab>That is unfortunate indeed. If we had an ample supply of your most miraculous salve at the Imperative, I daresay it would do wonders for the soldiers' morale. Is there nothing we can do...?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_087<tab>Je vois... C'est bien dommage. Avec une plus grande production, les soldats de L'Impératif d'Ostall pourraient en bénéficier aussi...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_A1_000_001<tab>Why not speak with Mauwyl?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_A1_000_001<tab>Et si vous demandiez à Mauwyl<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_A1_000_002<tab>I can think of one man for the job...
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_A1_000_002<tab>Et si vous engagiez quelqu'un pour les récolter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_088<tab>But of course! The answer was right in front of us all along!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_088<tab>Quelle bonne idée<var 1D /var>! Un bûcheron comme Mauwyl doit cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment savoir où trouver chaque plante<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_089<tab>If you are not otherwise occupied, Miss Callea, might you accompany me to the Crystarium? There is someone I would very much like you to meet.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_089<tab>Mademoiselle Callea, accepteriez-vous de me suivre à Cristarium<var 1D /var>? J'aimerais vous présenter quelqu'un.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_090<tab>T-Truly!? But I... Well, I suppose I don't have any patients waiting at the moment.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_090<tab>Euh... d'accord. Je n'ai pas de patient ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment, et si je reviens vite, ça ne devrait pas poser de problème.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_091<tab>Then it is settled. If you have no pressing commitments, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, might you also be so kind as to accompany us as well?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_091<tab>Très bien<var 1D /var>! Alors nous partons pour Cristarium. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous venez avec nous, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_092<tab>Not quite sure what ye have in mind, but I trust that ye have Callea's best interests at heart. Take care of yerself out there, friends.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_NIELDEN_000_092<tab>Bon, j'ai pas tout compris, mais vous savez sûrement ce que vous faites. Veillez bien sur Callea<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_093<tab>Worry not for the girl─we will see that she is safe.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_093<tab>Vous n'avez rien à craindre. Très bien, en route, alors.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_100<tab>This the man Ser Tolas wishes to introduce to me? He looks so young.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_100<tab>Est-ce la personne que vous vouliez me présenter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MAUWYL_000_101<tab>Well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Come all the way back to see your friend Mauwyl, have you? The pleasure's all mine!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MAUWYL_000_101<tab>Oh, c'est vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Vous êtes tous ici pour me voir<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_102<tab>Here is a list of the supplies we require at the Imperative. As you will note, lumber for building is in especially short supply. We are counting on you.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_102<tab>Voici la liste des matériaux dont ont besoin nos soldats. Il nous manque notamment beaucoup de bois pour réparer les murs du château... J'espère qu'on pourra compter sur ton équipe.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MAUWYL_000_103<tab>No worries, friend─that's my specialty! By the by, who's the young lady? Something tells me you brought her here for a reason...
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MAUWYL_000_103<tab>Très bien. Mais sinon, qui est cette dame<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MAUWYL_000_104<tab>Ingredients for your potions, you say? You've come to the right place! Forest flora is second nature to me, and with my handy stink bombs, I can grab you all the herbs and weeds you need without any beasts bothering me!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_MAUWYL_000_104<tab>... Je vois, il vous faut des plantes pour vos potions. Je pense que les bûcherons pourront vous aider, pour ça.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_105<tab>Truly, you'd do this for me!? Oh, you are too kind! I'll draft a list straightaway!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_CALLEA_000_105<tab>Ah, formidable<var 1D /var>! Je vais donner la liste de ce qu'il me faut, alors<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_106<tab>I do believe this will be the beginning of a highly mutually beneficial relationship.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_106<tab>Tout est bien qui finit bien, on dirait.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_107<tab>You really are a most remarkable <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>. It is as if, just by making your way through the world as you do, you bring together those around you, uniting them toward a common purpose.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_107<tab>Vous êtes décidément quelqu'un d'ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nel. Non seulement vous êtes doué<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> au combat, mais vous avez un don pour rapprocher les gens et nouer des liens...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_108<tab>If all goes according to plan, Miss Callea's medicine should avail us greatly at the Imperative, giving us greater strength in the battle to defend these lands against the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_108<tab>Si cet accord se passe bien, les soldats de L'Impératif d'Ostall pourront bénéficier de soins de qualité à l'avenir. Tout ceci n'aurait jamais été possible sans vous.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_109<tab>By bringing us together, you have not only enriched our own lives. You have given the people of Lakeland the hope of a brighter future.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_109<tab>Je vais continuer mes efforts pour améliorer la situation à Grand-Lac, en coopérant avec Mauwyl et Callea bien sûr. Grâce à ces liens que vous avez créés...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_110<tab>Once more, you have my profound gratitude, my friend. I will remember your kindness to the very end of my days.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH005_03515_TOLAS_000_110<tab>Merci encore pour tout.
